messages.messageBody:
I will. :-) <big cheesy grin> That was a mindless vent, thankfully
on the board and not at Zachary? I said that in frustration.

Ren, you are an inspiration...more than you'll EVER know!

~Sandy

--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "Ren Allen"
<starsuncloud@...> wrote:
>
> "++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
> I agree, so if he still doesn't get it after reading my 'book' perhaps
> I'm better off with relaxed schooling and just sticking with it
> because this back and forth shit is not healthy at all."
>
> So TWO parents hoisting that shit on them is better than ONE???HOW??
> If you ever WANT him to get it, stick to your guns darling.
>
> Ren
> learninginfreedom.com

messages.subject: *SIGH* big dh hurdle to try and overcome
messages.msgSnippet: ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ I agree, so if he still doesn t get it after reading my book perhaps I m better off
messages.messageBody:
"++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
I agree, so if he still doesn't get it after reading my 'book' perhaps
I'm better off with relaxed schooling and just sticking with it
because this back and forth shit is not healthy at all."

So TWO parents hoisting that shit on them is better than ONE???HOW??
If you ever WANT him to get it, stick to your guns darling.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
